Male01_Torso_school_12_description
A school uniform top with a shorter length than usual. Matched with a yellow undershirt that complements the top's yellow lining.[#Legal]
Un haut d'uniforme d'écolier plus court que d'ordinaire. S'accorde avec un tee-shirt jaune rappelant la doublure de la veste.[#Legal]
Ein Schuluniform-Oberteil, das etwas kürzer ist als üblich. Dazu ein passendes gelbes Unterhemd, welches auf die Fütterung des Oberteils abgestimmt ist.[#Legal]
Uniforme scolastica leggermente più corta del normale. Abbinata a una maglietta gialla che richiama lo stesso colore della fodera interna.[#Legal]
Una parte superior de uniforme escolar más corta de lo normal. Lleva una camiseta amarillo a juego con el forro interior amarillo de la chaqueta.[#Legal]
着丈が短い、学生服の上着。服の裏地とインナーを、黄色でそろえたタイプ。[#Legal]
길이가 짧은 학생복 상의. 옷의 안감과 이너를 노란색으로 통일한 타입. [#Legal]
A short school uniform top. The inner lining of the jacket and the shirt are matching yellow.[#Legal]
短學生服外套。外套內裡和襯底均統一為黃色的造型。[#Legal]
短學生服外套。外套內裡和襯底均統一為黃色的造型。[#Legal]
A school uniform top with a shorter length than usual. Matched with a yellow undershirt that complements the top's yellow lining.[#Legal]
